description:
The Portuguese Association for Biofabrication (APB) would like to invite you to participate in the 1st Meeting of the Association, which will be held in Porto (Portugal) on June 15th, 2018. The aim of this meeting is to create a forum where all individuals interested in Biofabrication, namely researchers, graduate and undergraduate students, from academic, industrial and medical sectors are able to share experiences and ideas through the dissemination of the latest research undertaken in Portugal and abroad in the field of Biofabrication.
We hope that this 1st Meeting will lay the first stone in bringing together the Biofabrication community in Portugal. This event will be entirely free, therefore, we hope to meet you all in Porto.

The Organizing Committee



Program

8:30h - 9:30h Registration
9:15h - 9:30h Welcome and Opening Speech - Pedro Costa, APB President
9:30h - 10:15h Plenary 1 - Alvaro Mata, Queen Mary University of London
10:15h - 11:00h Session 1 – Biofabrication Technologies
                              - Keynote Speaker - Ricardo Ribeiro, Newcastle University
                              - Talks TBA (selected abstracts)
11:00h - 11:30h Coffee Break and Networking
11:30h - 12:30h Session 2 – Application of Biofabrication
                              - Keynote Speaker - Pedro Costa, BIOFABICS - 3D Biotissue Analogues                              - Talks TBA (selected abstracts)
12:30h - 13:30h Lunch and Networking
13:30h - 14:15h Plenary 2 – Aleksandr Ovsianikov, TU Wien
14:15-16:00h Session 3 – Biomaterials/Biomatrices
                              - Keynote Speaker - Miguel Castilho, UMC Utrecht & Eindhoven University of Technology                              - Talks TBA (selected abstracts)
16:00h - 16:30h Coffee Break and Networking
16:30h -18:00h Session 4 – Cell-based Fabrication
                              - Keynote Speaker - Daniela Campos, RWTH Aachen University                              - Talks TBA (selected abstracts)
18:00h - 18:30h Final Remarks


More info: https://apbiofab.pt/meeting
name: 1st Meeting of the Portuguese Association for Biofabrication
